channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Man Who Was Two
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Harold Ward)
item.description: Six years ago, the death of New York City Detective Capt. John Connors was reported by the papers. Today, the man he arrested claims to know the true fate of the detective hero.
